item.title: Ctrl+Shift+R - Force a hard refresh page. If you updated the page on the hosting but don't see any changes.
item.description: Ctrl+Shift+R - Force a hard refresh page. If you updated the page on the hosting but don't see any changes.

item.title: When there are a lot of things on the site, then you start thinking about the structure: different folders for different things, and all this needs to be called somehow, and this is part of SEO. It's difficult at first, and the structure evolves and changes over time, so there will often be many pag
item.description: When there are a lot of things on the site, then you start thinking about the structure: different folders for different things, and all this needs to be called somehow, and this is part of SEO. It's difficult at first, and the structure evolves and changes over time, so there will often be many pages with a 404 not found error.

item.title: It's a bit strange, but I noticed that Wikipedia uses a comma in the URL. I didn't know that a comma is standard practice for URLs.
item.description: It's a bit strange, but I noticed that Wikipedia uses a comma in the URL. I didn't know that a comma is standard practice for URLs.

item.title: The default is now random all light and all dark themes.
item.description: The default is now random all light and all dark themes.

item.title: Update: === 1. Added a tag editing button (function) for the tags list (explore panel) on the main page; tags are stored locally in the browser. 2. I added to the start page a not-so-old "speed dial" panel for the links, links stored only locally in the browser too.
item.description: Update: === 1. Added a tag editing button (function) for the tags list (explore panel) on the main page; tags are stored locally in the browser. 2. I added to the start page a not-so-old "speed dial" panel for the links, links stored only locally in the browser too.

item.title: Fixed the CSS style in the navigation, when the element was active, underlining was incorrect and thin.
item.description: Fixed the CSS style in the navigation, when the element was active, underlining was incorrect and thin.

item.title:
Page refresh trick. === If you use a JS file and the page does not show its fresh version, open the JS file and click: reload the page button, then you will get the latest version of the page.
(Maybe the JS file is stuck in the cache, Firefox browser on PC.)
item.description:
Page refresh trick. === If you use a JS file and the page does not show its fresh version, open the JS file and click: reload the page button, then you will get the latest version of the page.
(Maybe the JS file is stuck in the cache, Firefox browser on PC.)

item.title: Tag Cloud Update: Added a toggle mode between special and random tags when navigating the platform's website directory.
item.description: Tag Cloud Update: Added a toggle mode between special and random tags when navigating the platform's website directory.
